profile.name: Veera Venkata Sai
profile.title: Java Full Stack Developer • React • Spring Boot • Cloud

about: Java Full Stack Developer with 3 years of experience building web applications, microservices, and cloud‑native solutions on AWS and Azure. I craft responsive frontends in React/Angular and robust backends with Spring Boot and REST. Experience across process optimization, e‑commerce, and logistics within Agile teams.
